hero.title: Dependable Ecommerce and Shopify Solutions

about-us.title: About us
about-us.message: crocode is a trusted partner in the world of Shopify and Shopify Plus. We help businesses reach the next level and fully unlock the potential of online sales.
about-us.text: Mgroup, a leading Shopify development agency, provides comprehensive end-to-end Shopify development services tailored to your unique needs and goals. Our team of Shopify experts, as a trusted Shopify agency, offers specialized support to Shopify store owners, ensuring optimization of every aspect of your online business. Our Shopify Plus agency services cover all areas of e-commerce: from setup and customization to ongoing maintenance and optimization. With extensive experience as a Shopify Plus partner, our Shopify development agency stays ahead of industry trends and best practices, helping you maintain a competitive edge.

card1.title: eCommerce
card1.text: Software development for your online store automates all processes and helps you save time, increase business productivity and support its successful operation.

card2.title: WEB
card2.text: We design visually striking, user-friendly, and SEO-optimized websites for businesses, including ecommerce, shopping platforms, and blogs, helping them build trust with their audience.

card3.title: MOBILE
card3.text: We develop intuitive, high-performance mobile apps for industries like ecommerce, entertainment, and healthcare, ensuring a seamless user experience across all devices.

experts.text: We are a certified Shopify agency specializing in partnering with brands to create, build, launch, maintain, and expand Shopify and Shopify Plus stores. As a trusted Shopify partner, we’re here whenever you’re ready. Get in touch with our team to discuss your project.

hero.title: Our Approach
hero.subtitle: We are a Shopify Experts agency that helps ecommerce sites grow by boosting sales, expanding product range, and increasing conversion rates.We are a Shopify Experts agency that helps ecommerce sites grow by boosting sales, expanding product range, and increasing conversion rates

card1.title: Creativity
card1.description: We focus on UX and UI design to create engaging, seamless Shopify experiences that guide customers effortlessly through the store. Our in-house design and development team craft unique, memorable sites aligned with omni-channel campaigns and ecommerce goals. We also prioritize brand identity, logos, and conversion-driven strategies.

card2.title: Technology
card2.description: As Shopify Experts, we deliver advanced software using modern tech and secure integrations, partnering with top providers to enhance Shopify’s features and ensure future-ready, high-performance solutions.

card3.title: Data
card3.description: Our Shopify developers build ecommerce stores focused on commercial value and business goals. Guided by data and analytics, we provide strategic insights and challenge page status quo to optimize performance. By combining experience, traffic data, and creativity, we maximize the benefits of the Shopify platform and deliver results through tailored marketing strategies.

AgencyDescription.title: People-first agency
AgencyDescription.text1: We are a highly skilled, multi-disciplinary Shopify agency dedicated to delivering innovative, data-driven ecommerce solutions and exceptional customer experiences. At the heart of our work is a people-first philosophy that values trust, independence, and personal growth. This approach creates an open environment where our team feels empowered to challenge conventions and deliver the best outcomes for our merchants.
AgencyDescription.text2: Our remote-first culture encourages creative freedom by avoiding micromanagement, allowing our specialists to think outside the box and go the extra mile. We place equal importance on the experience of our merchants and our team members, fostering a supportive community that genuinely cares. This strong foundation of people-first values sets us apart and enables us to bring exceptional personal and commercial value to every project we undertake.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose crocode?
whyChooseUs.description: Creative collaboration underpins everything we do as Shopify Experts in London. We build close-working relationships with our clients and partners to work with goals in mind whilst offering a wealth of digital expertise. From startup-ups to world-leading brands, we deliver ecommerce strategies to deliver Shopify & Shopify Plus stores that perform.

card1.text: We go beyond standard solutions to create Shopify stores that challenge the conventions of design and technical capability. Our goal is not just to implement features, but to create a digital experience that delights your customers and gives you a real competitive advantage.

card2.text: We believe that great decisions come from data, not guesses. Our team delves into your store's analytics to identify growth points, optimize the user experience, and increase conversion. We build not just websites, but powerful tools for scaling your business.

card3.text: Our work doesn't end on launch day. We become your long-term technical partners, ensuring your store runs smoothly, providing prompt support, and helping you adapt to new challenges. Your success is our success, and we are committed to supporting you at every step of the way.

card4.text: As certified Shopify and Shopify Plus experts, we have an in-depth understanding of the platform. This allows us to recommend the most effective and modern solutions, leverage best practices, and avoid common pitfalls, saving you time and budget.

description.title: Here is a revised version tailored for DesiDesign & Development
description.text1: As a specialized Shopify Migration Agency, DesiDesign & Development excels in replatforming ecommerce stores to Shopify and Shopify Plus with precision and care. We recognize that migrating your online store to a new platform can be challenging, which is why our expert Shopify migration services provide comprehensive support, ensuring a smooth and efficient transition from beginning to end.
description.text2: Our process includes thorough data architectural analysis, secure exporting and importing of data, and meticulous replatforming to guarantee that your site content, customer information, and order histories remain intact and unaltered. Whether you want to migrate from Magento, WooCommerce, BigCommerce, or any other ecommerce platform, DesiDesign & Development is your trusted partner for a seamless Shopify migration.

whyShopify.title: Why Choose to Shopify?
whyShopify.mainText: Creative collaboration underpins everything we do as Shopify Experts in London. We build close-working relationships with our clients and partners to work with goals in mind whilst offering a wealth of digital expertise.

offer1.title: What does Shopify offer?
offer1.text1: Shopify tends to be the go-to option for ecommerce merchants as it is one of the most scalable, feature-rich and fastest growing ecommerce platforms that exists today. Shopify and Shopify Plus are constantly updated to stay on top of trends and to provide a competitive edge over its competitors such as Magento, BigCommerce and WooCommerce.
offer1.text2: Shopify is equipped with a plethora of features and 6,000+ apps that allow merchants to nurture their business and deliver a more powerful ecommerce experience. The flexibility of the app store means Shopify continually becomes more and more powerful with the world's best developers delivering the very best apps for you to use, making it very a worthwhile investment to migrate over to for long-term growth.

details.title: More details about the service
details.text1: Our team specializes in comprehensive digital business transformation. We help companies adapt to modern realities by implementing advanced technological solutions that increase efficiency and competitiveness.
details.text2: Since 2015, we have successfully completed over 500 projects across various industries: from manufacturing and logistics to retail and financial services. Our approach is based on a deep understanding of each business's specifics and applying international best practices.

included.title: What is included in the service?
included.item1: Analysis of current business processes and identification of growth points
included.item2: Development of a personalized digital transformation strategy
included.item3: Implementation of modern technologies and process automation
